responseText: Unless we act, it is an inevitability. Long past, our people - far east in the desert, had to make a pilgrimage under threat of attack the entire way, to reach the portal in the city of Aela. So many were killed along that road. But few tell this story. Now, there is a man, a Kaelar man, who has been excavating the sites of ancient Vaelune refugee encampments near the new settlement of Miraleth. These were temporary settlements, holdouts, really, from the time of the exodus. No doubt he intends to profit from his excavations. I'm unsure how, though, will he just sell the artifacts of my people? I'm keen to find out.
name: SQ_RVR_NPC_Samias_Miraleth_Sabah_34_Response
